directions.step:
Beat eggs in top of a double boiler. Gradually blend in juice and stock. Cook over hot water until thickened. Beat until foamy. Serve hot over vegetables. Calories: 9 per Tablespoon. Yield: 2 cups.
LOW CALORIE
From <Traditions: A Taste of the Good Life>, by the Little Rock (AR) Junior League. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
